meanings.sent1: The custardy pie was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: The custardy dessert melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: The custardy texture of the pudding made it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a custardy smoothness that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The custardy clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.

meanings.definition: Having the texture or consistency of custard.
meanings.sent1: The cake was custardy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: The custardy soup was warm and comforting.
meanings.sent3: The custardy feel of the fabric was surprisingly pleasant.
meanings.sent4: The custardy mud made walking through the field a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The custardy lava flowed slowly down the volcano.
